MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Easton Road, Pilch Lane East and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:05PM on 19th April 2021.
